ingredients.content: 40 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces (2 cm)
extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling

preparations.content: Place Parmesan in mixing bowl and grate <b>8 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place leeks and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add potatoes, water and vegetable stock then cook <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add 125 g spinach and cook <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add remaining 125 g spinach and cook <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add reserved grated Parmesan, cream, salt and pepper then blend <b>1 min/speed 4<b>-9, increasing speed gradually<b>.
Serve immediately with a drizzle of oil and toasted baguette slices.
